languages.text: {n}Маршал кивает — кажется, к такому тону он привык больше, чем к вежливому словоплетству.{/n} "Варп-шторма, обрушившиеся на Простор Коронус, лишили нас кораблей, людей и ресурсов. Мы обратились к вам как правопреемни{mf|ку|це} договора, заключенного с Леди Теодорой".

{n}The Marshal nods — he seems more accustomed to the tone you have chosen than to wordy pleasantries.{/n} "Warp storms ravaging the Koronus Expanse have deprived us of ships, people, and resources. And so, we must approach you as the inheritor of the pact we made with Lady Theodora."
languages.original_text: {n}Маршал кивает — кажется, к такому тону он привык больше, чем к вежливому словоплетству.{/n} "Варп-шторма, обрушившиеся на Простор Коронус, лишили нас кораблей, людей и ресурсов. Мы обратились к вам как правопреемни{mf|ку|це} договора, заключенного с Леди Теодорой".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Marshal nods — he seems more accustomed to the tone you have chosen than to wordy pleasantries.{/n} "Warp storms ravaging the Koronus Expanse have deprived us of ships, people, and resources. And so, we must approach you as the inheritor of the pact we made with Lady Theodora."

{n}The Marshal nods — he seems more accustomed to the tone you have chosen than to wordy pleasantries.{/n} "Warp storms ravaging the Koronus Expanse have deprived us of ships, people, and resources. And so, we must approach you as the inheritor of the pact we made with Lady Theodora."

{n}The Marshal nods — he seems more accustomed to the tone you have chosen than to wordy pleasantries.{/n} "Warp storms ravaging the Koronus Expanse have deprived us of ships, people, and resources. And so, we must approach you as the inheritor of the pact we made with Lady Theodora."

{n}The Marshal nods — he seems more accustomed to the tone you have chosen than to wordy pleasantries.{/n} "Warp storms ravaging the Koronus Expanse have deprived us of ships, people, and resources. And so, we must approach you as the inheritor of the pact we made with Lady Theodora."

{n}The Marshal nods — he seems more accustomed to the tone you have chosen than to wordy pleasantries.{/n} "Warp storms ravaging the Koronus Expanse have deprived us of ships, people, and resources. And so, we must approach you as the inheritor of the pact we made with Lady Theodora."

{n}The Marshal nods — he seems more accustomed to the tone you have chosen than to wordy pleasantries.{/n} "Warp storms ravaging the Koronus Expanse have deprived us of ships, people, and resources. And so, we must approach you as the inheritor of the pact we made with Lady Theodora."

languages.text: {n}Le maréchal acquiesce, visiblement plus habitué au ton que vous employez qu'aux échanges de politesses et mondanités.{/n} « Les tempêtes Warp qui font rage dans les Étendues de Koronus nous ont coûté bon nombre de vaisseaux, équipages et ressources, raison pour laquelle nous devons faire appel à vous en vertu du pacte conclu avec dame Théodora, dont vous êtes l'{mf|héritier|héritière}. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal nods — he seems more accustomed to the tone you have chosen than to wordy pleasantries.{/n} "Warp storms ravaging the Koronus Expanse have deprived us of ships, people, and resources. And so, we must approach you as the inheritor of the pact we made with Lady Theodora."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le maréchal acquiesce, visiblement plus habitué au ton que vous employez qu'aux échanges de politesses et mondanités.{/n} « Les tempêtes Warp qui font rage dans les Étendues de Koronus nous ont coûté bon nombre de vaisseaux, équipages et ressources, raison pour laquelle nous devons faire appel à vous en vertu du pacte conclu avec dame Théodora, dont vous êtes l'{mf|héritier|héritière}. »

languages.text: {n}El Mariscal asiente; parece más acostumbrado al tono que has elegido que a las formalidades verbosas.{/n} «Las tormentas de disformidad que asolan la Extensión de Koronus nos han privado de naves, recursos y personal. Por tanto, debemos recurrir a usted, como hereder{mf|o|a} de nuestro pacto con lady Theodora».
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal nods — he seems more accustomed to the tone you have chosen than to wordy pleasantries.{/n} "Warp storms ravaging the Koronus Expanse have deprived us of ships, people, and resources. And so, we must approach you as the inheritor of the pact we made with Lady Theodora."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Mariscal asiente; parece más acostumbrado al tono que has elegido que a las formalidades verbosas.{/n} «Las tormentas de disformidad que asolan la Extensión de Koronus nos han privado de naves, recursos y personal. Por tanto, debemos recurrir a usted, como hereder{o|a} de nuestro pacto con lady Theodora».

languages.text: {n}元帅点了点头，他似乎更习惯你直来直去的语气，厌恶冗长乏味的客套。{/n}“亚空间风暴席卷了科罗努斯扩区，造成了舰船、人手、资源等各个方面的损失。西奥多拉夫人曾与我们缔结过盟约，而你是她的继承人，我们必须与你见面。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal nods — he seems more accustomed to the tone you have chosen than to wordy pleasantries.{/n} "Warp storms ravaging the Koronus Expanse have deprived us of ships, people, and resources. And so, we must approach you as the inheritor of the pact we made with Lady Theodora."

traits.locale_text: {n}元帅点了点头，他似乎更习惯你直来直去的语气，厌恶冗长乏味的客套。{/n}“亚空间风暴席卷了科罗努斯扩区，造成了舰船、人手、资源等各个方面的损失。西奥多拉夫人曾与我们缔结过盟约，而你是她的继承人，我们必须与你见面。”

languages.text: {n}Der Marschall nickt ... er scheint mit dem von dir angeschlagenen Ton besser vertraut zu sein, als mit wortreichen Freundlichkeiten.{/n} "In der Koronus-Ausdehnung wütende Warpstürme haben uns viele Schiffe, Leute und Ressourcen gekostet. Deshalb sind wir gezwungen, uns an Euch zu wenden, {mf|den Erben|die Erbin} unsere Paktes mit Lady Theodora.
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal nods — he seems more accustomed to the tone you have chosen than to wordy pleasantries.{/n} "Warp storms ravaging the Koronus Expanse have deprived us of ships, people, and resources. And so, we must approach you as the inheritor of the pact we made with Lady Theodora."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Marschall nickt ... er scheint mit dem von dir angeschlagenen Ton besser vertraut zu sein, als mit wortreichen Freundlichkeiten.{/n} "In der Koronus-Ausdehnung wütende Warpstürme haben uns viele Schiffe, Leute und Ressourcen gekostet. Deshalb sind wir gezwungen, uns an Euch zu wenden, {mf|den Erben|die Erbin} unsere Paktes mit Lady Theodora.

languages.text: {n}将帥は頷く―冗長な社交辞令よりもあなたのトーンに慣れているように見える。{/n}「コロヌス・エクスパンスを荒廃させた〈歪み〉の嵐は、私たちから船、人員、資源を奪いました。そのため、私たちはレディ・シオドーラと交わした協定の後継者としてあなたとお近づきにならなければなりません」
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal nods — he seems more accustomed to the tone you have chosen than to wordy pleasantries.{/n} "Warp storms ravaging the Koronus Expanse have deprived us of ships, people, and resources. And so, we must approach you as the inheritor of the pact we made with Lady Theodora."

traits.locale_text: {n}将帥は頷く―冗長な社交辞令よりもあなたのトーンに慣れているように見える。{/n}「コロヌス・エクスパンスを荒廃させた〈歪み〉の嵐は、私たちから船、人員、資源を奪いました。そのため、私たちはレディ・シオドーラと交わした協定の後継者としてあなたとお近づきにならなければなりません」

languages.text: {n}Miralay başını sallıyor. Laf kalabalığı yapmaktansa tercih ettiğin üsluba daha alışkın görünüyor.{/n} "Koronus Enginliği'ni kasıp kavuran öteboyut fırtınaları bizi gemilerden, insanlardan ve kaynaklardan mahrum bıraktı. Bu yüzden Leydi Theodora ile yaptığımız anlaşmanın mirasçısı olarak size gelmek durumunda kaldık."
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal nods — he seems more accustomed to the tone you have chosen than to wordy pleasantries.{/n} "Warp storms ravaging the Koronus Expanse have deprived us of ships, people, and resources. And so, we must approach you as the inheritor of the pact we made with Lady Theodora."

traits.locale_text: {n}Miralay başını sallıyor. Laf kalabalığı yapmaktansa tercih ettiğin üsluba daha alışkın görünüyor.{/n} "Koronus Enginliği'ni kasıp kavuran öteboyut fırtınaları bizi gemilerden, insanlardan ve kaynaklardan mahrum bıraktı. Bu yüzden Leydi Theodora ile yaptığımız anlaşmanın mirasçısı olarak size gelmek durumunda kaldık."
